documents.document: @RoddyFrame Happy Birthday 🎉🎂🔞

@robert_t_bruce @stafnz @WorldRugby7s Is it 1-4 in finish order then from 4th seed backwards 5-8 then down and forwards 9-12 down 13-16
@Scotlandteam Great weekend. 3rd place is a magnificent result and you pushed Fiji all the way in the semis. #superproudscot
@Scotlandteam Congrats on picking yourselves up today after the Canada game. Takes guts and strength. Now build on that tomorrow #HSBC7s
@mizjwilliams I like the honesty in that last tweet Quine.
@robert_t_bruce You have nailed it. Will get out of foetal position soon
@robert_t_bruce If stuck with tri just over $800 and if paid $18 more on 1st 4 would have got $4,700. Gutted 😭💰😭💰Just popped now Our Daisy
@robert_t_bruce I had 1,2,3,5, unplaced, changed from trick to 1st 4, wanted to add no1 needed $18 more, went na should stuck tri
@robert_t_bruce @Globalgallop @rosiemyers3 Nice one, for $18 more I would have got 5% F4 by adding Volk chickened out got zip
@robert_t_bruce Will do. Hope you've got plenty sun block on
@robert_t_bruce I saved money and also didn't back Francome. More money saved
@Scotlandteam Just a big thumbs up to the management team I meat tonight in NZ for the sevens. Top blokes
@tartankiwi75 @TennentsLager @TuiBeer @EveningExpress @NeilDrysdale Now if it was Speights it would be more believable
@eddireader My heart is with you, but Dinna tell my Mrs. your welcome back in NZ any time
@eddireader Deffo nae you. Now your making me feel bad Eddie. It's that old one of make it clear before I post as it can be read many ways
@eddireader just got a wee bit more sunburn down in NZ now. Celebrations coming to an end here. Haggis n Black Pudd… https://t.co/nsvBgO0yCA
@eddireader I'll gee you a kiss if you get some sun on you. Peele Wally disna do it for me
@EveningExpress @NeilDrysdale You could make do with haggis n black pudding pizza New Zealand 🇳🇿 style washed down… https://t.co/MeFG2pRqAk
A mans a man for all that https://t.co/GTazOfzKzF
@robert_t_bruce What a fizzer, only the management team we're here. False advertising. #givememymoneyback
@mizjwilliams @LloydBurr I can also tell you he's nae thin either 😱
@mizjwilliams Not only is the food looking good. I've got the sweeties as well. Malthouse here I come. To celebrate… https://t.co/X49ncb3pDJ
@malthouse I'm on my way from misery to happiness today. Also bringing some sweeties https://t.co/qEEflGBnEX
@MilesDavisLive @robert_t_bruce @malthouse So do you want me to set a place at the table for you,or will you be serving thee at ur old haunt
@robert_t_bruce @malthouse Outstanding food, this will upset @MilesDavisLive Cmon the Jocks
@mizjwilliams You can not miss out on this. Heaven on a plate has arrived in Wellington https://t.co/Y2eLoINcvu
@PaulLawriegolf @CBQatarMasters Hoping you can make it for the 3rd time. Do they need a new trophy just like Brazil kept World Cup on 3rdwin
@MilesDavisLive @robert_t_bruce Ah the old "Wee Willie Winkie" or as they are here breakfast sausage. That would be your size 🤥
@MilesDavisLive Where was the fallen Madonna witha the big boobies 😜
@MilesDavisLive Looks like you boys gave Renee a good kicking. Must have been him going what's this riff raff in 1st class
@micheletgolf Well done to you and the team. I know you will build from this. Here's to a great season on the @LETgolf
@bawads Agree 100%. No point in stretching out with your bat if your feet are going to be well short of the crease.
How is that out. Bat made crease before ball hit wicket. If you were printing in you usually reach forward with bat, nothing to do with feet
An absolute song and writing visionary taken from us 20 years ago today. https://t.co/xLEHUQEfM1
@altclassic Had the pleasure of meeting Billy at a Kraftwerk concert in Aberdeen. Always had time for his fans. #GoneTooSoon
@MeerGoose11 @CricketScotland Proud of all the lads, I'm sure there is more to come.
@Beagleboy172 @Desert_T20 Very proud of the teams efforts in the competition. Plenty positives to take away. Onwards & Upwards
@CricketScotland Great result to waken up to. 3 from 3
@CricketScotland @cdwdelange @Wally_smilo18 @crossy16 Cmon lads you can make it 3 from 3. Keep the momentum going. 🏏😜
@TAB_Racing @TAB_Sport Nice little Top up bonus of $10 through this morning, just for topping up account & betting. #moneyforjam
@robert_t_bruce Just changed channel, so he is. I'm going off to bed now. Oh I've been using your desk today, thanks

@robert_t_bruce Twas good watching Nick the Greek getting knocked out 🎾😜
